1.content: How did you wise to focus on?
1.title: The beginning

141.content: How young does she go?
141.title: She gets age regressed

choices: A fellow magic girl regresses her
1411.content: How's it going to happen?
1411.title: baby (1-2 years)

choices: Follow Homura taking the baby home
14111.content:
Mami was locked in combat with a witch, each bullet appeared to be useless. Eventually, Mami got an opening and charged her mega weapon. The witch saw this and said "Not so fast, you're too young to wield that!"

Mami then fired her gun and the witch shot a pink beam at Mami.

Both of them were hit by the other ones strike. Fortunately, Mami wasn't hurt. The beam actually appeared to do nothing at first.

Mami walked it off like it was nothing "Eh, that was easy."

Only two other magic girls were there, Homura and Kyoko.

"Are you sure? We should see if that beam did anything?" Homura said

"Nah, its nothing" Mami exclaimed

Then the spell kicked in. Her body started regressing at light speed. She looked down at her hands as they shrunk. Her hold body shrunk. The weight of her clothes became crushing. "Whaa wha happwenin to me!"

"Oh lord..." Kyoko said

Mami's regression eventually finished. She was nothing but a 1 year old now, crawling around in her clothes and looking for an exit. Huge hands quickly came down and picked her up. All of Mami's clothing below the waist fell, leaving bottom naked. A breeze passed by and Mami only had one thing to do. Cry. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA"

Homura, who was holding her, quickly pat her back. There there.. its okay. I'm here and I won't let anything happen to you."

"B-b-bu I doghn wanna be a babwy!"

"Well, I can't go back in time for something so... insignificant. Besides, you look really really cute!"

"Bu me naa babwy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

"But you are now. Come with me, you and I can be daughter and mother."

Kyoko finally said something "Hey! What about me?!"

"What about you?"

"I want to be her mother too!"

"Well, then we'll both be her mother. She needs two parents anyhow."

Mami blushed "No I doghn-ta!"

Homura just rocked her back and forth and ignored her. "So Kyoko, could you get some baby supplies for her. I'll take her home and get things situated best I can."

"Why you?"

"because I can stop time and prevent any spectators from seeing her like this. A baby in big girl clothes, people are going to get curious."

Kyoko sighed "Good point... Well then don't hog her when I get back. Its gonna take both of us."

Homura smiled "Of Course."
14111.title: A witch regresses her

144.content: Mami goes back in time as a result of a witch's attack. Mami was a skilled magical girl, but she did made a small clumsy mistake and was blasted to the past. Mami then traveled all the way back to...
144.title: She travels back in time

145.content: What else can happen to her? We could use the headless Mami meme for something?
145.title: Something else

choices: Mami's head being carried by her body
1451.content:
Oh great, we are doing that meme. Well here we go.

During a battle between the witch Charlotte in episode 3, Mami fought with all of her might, but she got arrogant and got her head bitten off. Madoka and Sayaka were frighten by the sight until Homura came and saved the day. With Charlotte defeated, Homura tries to find what is left of Mami. After some searching, Homura found...
1451.title: Became headless

choices: One of the girl bring Mami's head home
14511.content:
Homura only found Mami's head. Luckily her soul gem is still with her.

"What happened? Why can't I feel my arms, or legs, or a body for that matter?", asked Mami.

"You kind of got your head bitten off.", said Homura.

"What, then where's my body?", said Mami.

Homura searched for Mami's body and had no luck finding it. Madoka and Sayaka were happy that Mami is still alive, but is sadden about her state.

"What are we going to do?", asked Sayaka, "We can't can't bring Mami to school like this."

"We'll have to think of something.", said Homura.

"I have an idea, but you may not like it.", said Madoka.

"What would that be Madoka?", asked Mami's head.

"I might be willing to let Mami borrow my body until she can get a new one."

"A head swap?", asked Sayaka.

"No, I will not allow it.", said Homura.

"Madoka, I know you mean well, but what about your family?", said Mami.

"But I don't want to leave you as a head."

"How about this, I volunteer to let Mami borrow my body.", said Sayaka, "I might be a fun experience of being a disembodied head."

Homura thought about using her body, but she needs it to protect Madoka, but the raven haired suggested that, "How about one of us bring Mami to our house for the night and give her a new body tomorrow?"

The girls decided that...
14511.title: Only Mami's head

145111.content: They decide to do a head swap between Sayaka and Mami. Also I want to ask if this is a timeline where both Sayaka and Madoka are magical girls?
145111.title: Mami borrows Sayaka's body

choices: Suggest to check in a cementary
Uses her soul gem to swap heads with Homura
1451111.content:
So yah, this is the timeline where Sayaka and Madoka are magical girls. So Mami and Sayaka used their soul gems to swap heads and as a result, Mami has Sayaka's body and Sayaka is only a head.

"Sayaka, are you alright?", asked Madoka.

"Well, I feel numb below me, but other than that, I felt better than usual. I could get used to being just a head.", said Sayaka's head.

"I feel smaller, but beggars can't be choosers.", said Mami.

"Dang it, I forgot about what are we going to do with Sayaka's head.", said Madoka.

"I could take care of Sayaka for a while until Mami can get a new body.", said Homura.

"That might work, we need to tell her parents though."

And so the girls went home, they got an excuse for Sayaka not coming home for the night and Homura is in charge of taking care of Sayaka.

In the Akemi's residence, Sayaka's head was placed on a chair with her soul gem. Homura tries to think about what to do about Mami's situation. Suddenly Sayaka...
1451111.title: Yes

choices: Homura found the perfect body for Mami
14511111.content:
"Wouldn't that be disrespectful?", asked Homura.

"I doubt that it would be a problem. We just take it and find a way to cover this.", said Sayaka's head.

Homura thought about and decides to follow the idea because she does not want to take care of Sayaka's head anymore. She regret not having Madoka as a head. She went off to the nearest cemetery with Sayaka's head because she can't leave her alone. Homura places Sayaka on the ground and begins digging with a magic shovel. After a while...
14511111.title: Suggest to check in a cementary

145111112.content:
Homura notices that something does not seem right. Its a bit to quiet as she looks around. At first she ignores it and continue finding a body for Mami. She then remembers about Sayaka. Homura looked around and was worried. She must have rolled away or have been buried by the dirt from her digging. Homura then buries the holes that she made and went on searching for Sayaka.

The blue headed girl's bodiless head was somewhere after a small rolling trip. She was rolling down some hills and couldn't stop. When she finally did...
145111112.title: Sayaka's head is missing

choices: Sayaka give Homura her body back
14511112.content:
Sayaka's head touches her soul gem with her cheek and swap places with Homura. Sayaka has Homura's body while Homura is stuck as a head.

"Sayaka!", Homura's head screamed.

"What, I need to do some stretches a bit. Being a head is fun, but its somewhat boring and I felt like my body is aching, even though I don't have one.". said Sayaka as she places Homura's soul gem next to her.

"That's nice. Now give me back my body."

"In a minute."

After a while...
14511112.title: Uses her soul gem to swap heads with Homura

choices: We continue with Madoka and Sayaka's story
145111122.content:
Sayaka literally forgets about Homura's head. She actually slept in her bed and wakes up in the morning, eating breakfast and surprisingly forgets about Homura. The raven headed girl tries to get her body, but ends up losing every opportunity. In fact, she doesn't know how to do it. You can't blame Sayaka because she literally forget and was very sleepy the whole time, even in the morning.

When she went to school with Madoka, no one notices except for Mami and Madoka since they all have the same uniform and Sayaka was almost as tall as Homura. Everyone was suspicious about Mami's changed height at first, but Mami used her soul gem to make herself look normal to everyone's eyes.

After school, Madoka confronts Sayaka.

"Sayaka, did you steal Homura's body."

"Dang it, I forgot about Homura."

"You did! We got to give it back. Mami is looking in a cemetery and ask if we don't follow her to avoid trouble so we should get to Homura's house."

The two girls ran and Mami is trying to find herself a new body. And now...
145111122.title: Sayaka forgets about Homura

choices: Kyoko loses her head and is still alive
1451111221.content:
The two girls ran to Homura's house when suddenly Sayaka senses a familiar in an ally.

"Madoka, we need to get that familiar before it gets someone. I hope Homura can wait.", said Sayaka.

They transformed and ran after the familiar, but was stopped by a bunch of chains. It turns out to be from a magical girl with red hair, eating Pocky. That's right Kyoko is here.

"What are you doing?", asked Sayaka.

"What does it look like I'm doing. I'm letting the familiar go so that it can become a witch and I get the grief seeds. By the way, I'm Kyoko, hope you like my educational guide of being a magical girl.", said Kyoko.

"Well don't get 'ahead' of yourself.", said Sayaka.

"What does that mean?"

Sayaka whips out her soul gem and then a flash of blue light appeared. As a result...
1451111221.title: We continue with Madoka and Sayaka's story

14511112212.content:
Everyone's heads dropped on the ground. The bodies turned back to their normal civilian forms and dropped to the ground.

"Sayaka, what did you do?", said Madoka's head.

"What's the big idea?", said Kyoko's head.

"It was meant for you, red head.", said Sayaka's head.

"Who are you calling a red head, you jerk.", said Kyoko's head.

"Everyone, we won't get anywhere arguing.", said Madoka's head.

"Were not going anywhere without bodies.", said Kyoko's head.

"Look, how about we just get our bodies moving and pick us up.", said Sayaka's head.

And so the heads concentrate hard and their bodies came to life to pick them up. In the end...
14511112212.title: Everyone loses their heads

choices: They should put their heads back on
145111122121.content:
The bodies scrambled for a head and sadly they picked the wrong ones. The girls stood there as their heads are carried by the wrong bodies. Madoka has Homura's body, Sayaka has Kyoko's body and Kyoko has Madoka's body.

"The heck, I got a midget's body.", said Kyoko's head.

"That's mean.", said Madoka's head.

"Great, I got the body of the one I hate.", Sayaka's head said. Kyoko's body slapped her.

"Don't you dare dis my body.", said Kyoko's head.

"How about we just give each other's heads back?", said Madoka's head.

The girls spend time passing each others heads back until they got back to their original bodies. The girl then decided that...
145111122121.title: They got the wrong bodies

choices: Mami and she found a body
Mami, but she made no progress for a new body
1451111221211.content:
They like being heads for some reason.

"All this passing helps feels kind of fun.", said Madoka's head.

"Yeah, maybe I will stay like this for a bit.", said Kyoko's head.

With that, the red haired girl left.

Both Madoka and Sayaka put their heads back on their bodies. Well not Sayaka because she has Homura's body. As the girls ran to Homura's house, they found her head and surprisingly, Homura looked okay.

"Homura, are you okay?", asked Madoka.

"I'm fine. This may sound strange, but I kind of got used to being just a head.", said Homura's head.

"I know how that feels.", said Madoka.

"Now Sayaka, give me back my body!"

"Fine."

With that, Sayaka and Homura switched places. Homura has her body back while Sayaka is just a head once again.

Suddenly there was a knock on the door. it turns out to be...
1451111221211.title: They like being heads

choices: Keep their heads on for now on
14511112212111.content:
"Hey everyone,Kyubey told me that I can recreate my old body. Isn't that great.", said Mami.

The girls looked at Mami and surprised to see that Mami is still a head being carried by her body. Sayaka's body was then walking towards her head and picks her up. After all of this chaos, the girls decided to...
14511112212111.title: Mami and she found a body

choices: Stayed that way for a while
145111122121111.content:
Well after this mayhem, the girl surprising like being heads. Normally people would freak out about this, but these girls are different. Kyoko even joined their gang of headless magical girls and fight witches together. Things are very happy from then on. Though sometimes in battle, the girl's heads sometime roll away. Usually happens to Madoka, but Homura is there to save the day.

Until one day on the Walpurgis night, the girls fought with all they got, but they sacrifice their bodies in the process because just in case, Homura placed bombs in their bodies. She somehow did it.

The girls are left as heads on the ground looking at each other. There soul gems are a bit far from them, but about a foot away from them. Since the world is in an apocalyptic state, no one would care about five disembodied heads of girls.

"So what now. We save the day and what do we get? Nothing. We end up losing our bodies.", said Kyoko's head.

"If only we can reach our soul gems, we can get new bodies.", said Sayaka's head.

"I hope Kyubey comes.", said Madoka's head.

"I heard that he's going back to his planet for a month vacation.", Mami's head said.

All the head sigh.

"At least we have each other. We can wait for Kyubey.", said Homura's head.

The magical girl heads were more satisfied and just enjoyed the fact that they saved the day. They pretty much got used to not having their body weighing them down and then...
145111122121111.title: Be headless sometimes

choices: The soul gems are getting corrupted
1451111221211111.content: Everything was fine as they only talked about each others secrets and get to know each other. Homura even tells everyone what she truly is. It was fine though they now wish to have bodies again. And then suddenly...
1451111221211111.title: Stayed that way for a while

14511112212111111.content:
Kyubey came back.

"Kyubey, your back from your vacation.", Madoka's head said.

"Indeed I am. Congratulation on saving the world against Walpurgis.", said Kyubey.

"So Kyubey, are you willing to bring our soul gems to us so we can get us some new bodies?", asked Kyoko's head.

"Heck no. I find you all cute this way. We Incubators may not have any emotions, but we do have a sadistic nature over things that are inferior.", said Kyubey.

"What do you intend to do to us?", asked Homura's head.

Kyubey stood there with no emotion although he looks like he's thinking. The Puella Magi heads are worried at what Kyubey is going to do to them. Then Kyubey finally as an idea. He decides to use the girl's heads...
14511112212111111.title: Kyubey is back

choices: Kyubey got his friends to come over
Kyubey has plans for the Puella Magi heads
145111122121111111.content:
As trophies.

"What?!", all the girl's heads screamed.

"Don't take it too hard. At least you don't have to worry about your soul gems. You should also be grateful for the fact that I find you all attractive. Think of it as being a piece of art that I will gaze upon because your pretty.", said Kyubey.

With that, Kyubey has a space ship ready and abducts the magical heads. Madoka screams about her family and every reason she got, but Kyubey cares nothing for it. Kyubey then uses a device that would neutralize the corruption of the Puella Magi's soul gems and later places the heads on a shelf.

The heads looked at Kyubey as he tidies up his home. His house look like a futuristic version of a combination of a regular house and a dog's house. Sayaka looked amazed while Madoka looked scared. Homura's head is placed next to Madoka and she tries to calm Madoka down.

"Madoka, I know that you miss your family and everyone, but at least we're safe.", said Homura's head.

"Safe? My mom and dad must have been worried about me and I'm going to spend the rest of my life like this.", cried Madoka's head.

"Tell me this. Would you rather be just a head and alive or dead? Your parents may be worried, but the fact that your alive gives them hope."

"Your right Homura. I hope I can return to my parents no matter how I look."

Homura and Madoka smiles and got close to each other, trying to do something that is like a hug as heads.

"I find this relationship to be very interesting. Emotions may be pointless, but they do put up a good show and presents a unique beauty.", said Kyubey.

"Hey Kyubey, that floating sphere, what is that?", asked Sayaka's head.

"Its my couch."

Later...
145111122121111111.title: As trophies

choices: The two of them just keep their heads on their neck
145111122122.content:
Everyone got their heads and puts it back on, only Kyoko having her head backwards. Sayaka gave a small giggle and Kyoko growled.

"I'll get you back for this.", cried Kyoko.

The red magical girl struggled to walk away in her current state. Sayaka and Madoka were glad that's over and decided to go back to Homura's house. One problem is that their heads won't stay on. The two girl's heads fell off and their bodies caught it in time.

"Sayaka, what are we going to do? We can't go out like this.", cried Madoka.

"I'll think of something.", said Sayaka.

The blue haired girl kept trying to reattach her head back on even with the influence of her soul gem, it won't work. Sayaka then decided that...
145111122122.title: They got the right bodies

choices: Take her body back and get back at Sayaka
Borrow Madoka's body and Madoka borrows her's
1451111221221.content:
The two girls held their heads while walking to Homura house and manage to get there with no trouble. Occasionally Madoka's head would slightly fall, but Sayaka helped her out They made it and saw Homura's head looking really angry.

"Sayaka, you better give me back my body.", said Homura.

"Fine.", said Sayaka.

Homura's head then saw Madoka struggling to keep her head on and Homura stopped Sayaka to tell her something.

"Sayaka, what have you done to Madoka?!"

"It was an accident. This magical girl came and I used my magic to detach her head and Madoka got into the mix.", said Sayaka.

Homura's head thought about it for a bit. She could get her body back and get her revenge on Sayaka or just borrow Madoka's body since she wants to hug that cute petite body. She was willing to let Madoka have her body and then get her revenge on Sayaka.

Homura the head decides to...
1451111221221.title: The two of them just keep their heads on their ...

choices: Homura and Madoka are successfully attached
Homura and Madoka are stuck as heads
14511112212212.content:
"Sayaka, give me Madoka's body.", said Homura's head.

"Huh", asked Sayaka.

"Madoka couldn't be attached to her body so I think I might be able to be attached on it.", said Homura.

"Well, you do make a good point.", said Madoka.

So Sayaka pops her head off and switches with Homura. The girl then has her body give her head to Madoka and vice versa. The two put their heads on their neck and used their soul gems to get attached. Sayaka's head is left on a table nearby and waited to see what happens.

In the end..
14511112212212.title: Borrow Madoka's body and Madoka borrows her...

choices: Tries to steal one of the girls heads
Found a random object as a replacement
14512.content:
"Oh god!" said Homura.

Madoka and Sayaka were as shocked to see Mami without her head. Even worse is that the body is still able to move on it's own with her soul gem converted into her ring. It pats on the floor to look for her head. The girls felt sorry for Mami as she has to deal with a fate worse than death.

The body then for some reason...
14512.title: Only Mami's body

choices: Homura was too late and Madoka has her head stolen
Homura was just in time, but lost her head to Mami
145121.content:
Mami's body then rush after the nearest person in her reach as she grabbed Sayaka's head. Using her magic she was about to separate it, but Madoka tackles Mami. Sayaka rubs her neck in fear, but was glad that she was alright.

"What are you doing?!" cried Madoka.

The body then went after Madoka for her head as Homura tries to go save Madoka. In the end...
145121.title: Tries to steal one of the girls heads

choices: Mami is teleported to another world
1453.content: Well Mami can become a goddess like Madoka in the end of the series. Whoops, I spoiled the ending. Whatever, what's done has been done. Or we can teleport Mami to another world.
1453.title: Something else

choices: Met Homura and knows about Homura's history
14531.content:
Well instead of Madoka becoming a goddess, Mami did. When she made her wish with Kyubey, she ends up recreating the world in her image. Mami felt the power surging into her and saw the worl recreating itself. In the end, Mami kept it the same, but with some advantages for Mami.

In this world, Mami's parents are alive and everything seems normal except for Kyubey who spies on her.

"She seems to be very interesting.", said Kyubey, "She might be the key to end entropy once and for all."

Mami was walking to school one day and...
14531.title: Mami becomes a goddess

choices: Punish Kyubey for his past crimes against humanity
145311.content:
Mami spotted Kyubey and went up to him.

"I know what your capable of Incubator and I can help.", said Mami.

"Wow. That was easy.", said Kyubey.

"I could end your worries about this entropy with a snap."

Mami did a snap and at the Incubator's planet, they found a new energy source that is better than using magical girls.

"I don't know what to say.", said Kyubey.

"Neither do I. Now I want do more for you.", said Mami.

"What would that be?"

Mami then use her goddess powers to...
145311.title: Spotted Kyubey

1453111.content:
Mami then gave a snap of her fingers and suddenly Kyubey felt his heart beating. Kyubey was then overwhelmed by multiple feelings. Happiness, anger, sadness, joy, and so on. Kyubey then gave out a scream and then his mouth finally moves.

"What is this?", asked Kyubey.

"Its something that humans have that you don't. Emotion.", said Mami.

Kyubey ends up feeling weak from the power of feelings and in the end...
1453111.title: Give all Incubators emotions

choices: Do many random acts of kindness
14531111.content:
Kyubey ends up liking it. He never felt so free in his life. He thanked Mami and stop it with the contracts. Mami was happy about what has she done and decides to use her goddess powers to help other people. Kyubey says that he would visit Mami sometimes, but first he needs to visit his planet.

Mami then continues to get to class. She spends her time in class thinking about what would she do next. She can be a crime fighter or just some random person who helps people. She is a goddess so the possibilities are endless.

Mami decides to use her powers to...
14531111.title: Kyubey likes it

14533.content: What about Mami become a blueberry girl?
14533.title: something else

choices: Make her go back to the past
151.content: What we have here is Kyoko Sakura. What are we gonna do with her?
151.title: Kyoko Sakura

1513.content: What else we can do? Turn her into a goddess. Well we might see what Kyoko is capable of with so much power. Or we can make Kyoko into a ruler of the world since she may be capable of doing so.
1513.title: something else

choices: Kyoko gets fat from her current diet
15133.content: Has anyone notice that Kyoko eats too much? What would happen if she gain some pound since that is very logical that such event may occur. And not this is not a expansion thing.
15133.title: Something else

151332.content: Who's up for a time traveling adventure to the future?
151332.title: something else

1513322.content: How about transporting Kyoko into another dimension?
1513322.title: something else

15133221.content: Should we do Kyoko the favor of sending her to a dimension filled with nothing, but food?
15133221.title: Yes please

151332211.content: Well how did she get there? We got to have a reason that make sense to the series.
151332211.title: Yes

1513322111.content:
Starting from the part where Homura and Kyoko make a plan to stop Walpurgis, Homura thought about keeping Kyoko out of this. Homura decided to bring out her secret weapon.

"You got the ultimate flavor of Pocky.", Kyoko screamed.

"Yay, you can have it.", said Homura.

"Give me!"

Homura threw it and opened a portal that has Kyoko falling into it.

"At least she's safe. I probably should do the same for Madoka.", said Homura.

Kyoko falls into a abyss and notices that she fell into a portal. She made curses at Homura or what she had done and finally lands on something soft. Kyoko landed face down and smelled the ground. It was a giant doughnut. Kyoko manage to eat the whole thing and suddenly looked around her. The place was filled with food. Kyoko was happy about this and continue to eat everything at sight.

She ate the Pockey that Homura gave her, she drank the Miso soup in the river full of it, she ate all kind of fruit and candy. Kyoko might even want to thank Homura.

Eventually...
1513322111.title: Homura did it

choices: The other good things in her home world
15133221112.content:
Kyoko has been stuck in this realm for a while, like about a week. She continues to eat and with her magical girl powers, she can make herself skinny again. She felt as if she can no longer have any worries, but she felt like she needs too.

She often tries to brush off the idea, but just keep thinking about it.

"I should be worried, but I shouldn't. What the heck am I'm so worried about?", asked Kyoko.

The red haired girl realized what was up. She can't believe that she forgot about it. She forgot about...
15133221112.title: She happily enjoys her stay

151332212.content: How about a world where its filled with robots? Kyoko may even team up with her robotic counter part.
151332212.title: Another place would be better

1513322122.content: How about to our world and Kyoko will appear as a 3-D model? She will retain her anime look.
1513322122.title: No, something else

15133222.content: Lets make Kyoko go on a vacation to somewhere nice.
15133222.title: something else

151332222.content: Let make Kyoko have the ability to shape shift.
151332222.title: something else

1513322222.content: Make Kyoko a pirate. It would be fun.
1513322222.title: something else

15133222222.content: This is getting tiring, uh how about making Kyoko act like a super hero.
15133222222.title: something else

151332222222.content: Make Kyoko fight in a zombie apocalypse, that would be awesome.
151332222222.title: no

1513322222222.content: Make up your mind people. How about she becomes a mercenary? I'm running out of idea I think.
1513322222222.title: No

15133222222222.content: How about turning her into an animal?
15133222222222.title: Boring

151332222222222.content: Yeah, your right. How about we change her age?
151332222222222.title: That's just cruel

15533.content: If we all know who Junko is, how about we see how Junko acts when she is drunk at a bar? It would be a really strange story despite of not being a magical girl.
15533.title: Junko Kaname!?

155332.content: How about we make her into a magical girl? Its obvious since many fan stories do that.
155332.title: something else

info.brief_description: Strange Tales things happen in Madoka universe.
info.description:
No sex or swearing
keep things tasteful
have fun
info.pretty_title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica: Strange Tales
